scripts.build:cs: cd customer-support && yarn build && rm -rf ../docs/customer-support/* && mv build/* ../docs/customer-support
scripts.build:sm: cd social-messenger && yarn build && rm -rf ../docs/social-messenger/* && mv build/* ../docs/social-messenger
scripts.build:ve: cd virtual-event && yarn build && rm -rf ../docs/virtual-event/* && mv build/* ../docs/virtual-event
scripts.build:t: cd team && yarn build && rm -rf ../docs/team/* && mv build/* ../docs/team
scripts.build:gl: cd gaming-livestream && yarn build && rm -rf ../docs/gaming-livestream/* && mv build/* ../docs/gaming-livestream
scripts.build:all: yarn build:cs && yarn build:sm && yarn build:ve && yarn build:t && yarn build:gl
